designations.source_description: The principle legislation for wildlife protection in Northern Ireland
designations.designation_description: Plants which are protected from intentional picking, removal or destruction and from selling (in whole or part) and from advertising for sale.

designations.source: A Vascular Plant Red List for England
designations.source_description: A vascular plant Red List present for the first time the current state of England's flora measuredagainst standardised IUCN criteria. P.A. Stroh et al. 2014.
designations.reporting_category: Red listing based on 2001 IUCN guidelines
designations.designation_description: Occasionally, potential new native taxa that may have arrived via natural dispersal are kept on a Waiting List (WL) until such time as doubts over their native/alien status are resolved.
